content.description:
Nonplussed is one of the best compression lines I've climbed in the Unaweep area.

Sit start with a left hand pinch and a right hand on the arete. From there, slap the right hand up the arete, bump the left hand up to a sidepull, bump the right hand up the arete, bump the left hand up to a sidepull, reach the jug lip, match, traverse slightly left, throw a heel on, reach an edge, and top it out.
content.protection: A pair of pads will work well. The immediate landing is perfect. There is however a rock that may present a problem if you fall back to the right.
content.location: It climbs the northwest arete of T8791.

content.description: Sit start with hands matched on a generous sidepull-undercling. From there, paste a foot and set a kneebar, reach a three finger, left hand, incut edge, then gain the jug lip, match, throw a heel up, reach an edge, and top it out.
content.protection: A pair of pads. The landing doesn't get better than this one though.
content.location: It climbs the center north face of T8791.
